
### POSIX semaphores


```c
#include <semaphore.h>
...
sem_t my_semaphore;
int process_shared = /* 1 if sharing between processes */;
sem_init(&my_semaphore, process_shared, initial_value);
...
sem_wait(&my_semaphore);  /* down */
sem_post(&my_semaphore);  /* up */
...
sem_destroy(&my_semaphore);

```
